title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same REST surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration—use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component with chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat-style interface) for Ollama; runs in Docker, supports multi-model chats, code highlighting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper that adds REPL, prompt templates, and conversation persistence on top of ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; interact with models from Kotlin, Scala, or plain Java apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and chat with docs locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration; plug Ollama models into production-grade pipelines for QA, search, summarization.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service with async options, interceptors, and Swagger docs out-of-the-box.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; targets .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC, and optional web-ui sidecar.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose examples: CPU-only, NVIDIA, and AMD GPU stacks plus Open-WebUI integration.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Lightweight PyPI wrapper exposing Ollama’s embedding endpoint for sentence-transformers-style usage.

title: ollama-guard
summary: Middleware that filters prompts/responses via local Llama Guard model; plugs into reverse proxy or Express.
